subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
I am Yobo Micheal, the manager of First Atlantic Bank, let me instruct
myself, am been working with First Atlantic Bank for over 25 year and
due to my experience in the banking system I am in charge of the
remittance department.  I contacted you with my information from one
of the Liberia refugees (ALEX PATRICK GARRETT  25-YEAR-OLD BOY) who
lost her family in the critical war in their country. I am writing you
out of my investigation about he motive, I discover that he late
father (Mr. CHIEF PATRICK GARRETT) deposited  a huge sum of money (20
million Dollars) with First Atlantic Bank Ghana and 
our remittance
department ready to make the transfer to the new partner free of
charge which we just need to partner to contact us with information
and our remittance department we proceed
 i am looking for a reliable person who can take care of this young
BOY together with his property for investment abroad to enable he
continue he   education as he does not want to stay here in Africa or
do nothing with African after he horrible experiences.
Please try to get back to me as soon as possible to enable me to send
you the documentation covering the fund and from there we move forward
how you will use to receive the fund in your account smooth and the
young boy we join you for the investment there
Thanks
we need your urgent response
MR. YOBO MICHEAL

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Yobo Micheal,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances that have befallen Alex Patrick Garrett Boy. It's indeed a tragic situation.

I am interested in understanding more about this situation. Could you please provide more details on how this process works? Also, could you tell me more about Alex? What are his interests and what kind of investment is he looking forward to?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Earl

subject: THE DOCUMENATIONAL IS ATTACH BELOW REGARDS THE FUND TRANSFER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT
body:
*FIRST ATLANTIC BANK                   Bank Address; Head Office,654
airport residential Accra Ghana Bank Email ; info@firstaltantic-bnk.com
<info@firstaltantic-bnk.com> Bank Email ; firstatlanticbank255@gmail.com
<firstatlanticbank255@gmail.com> Bank Tell  ;* *+233531933310*

*Dear *
*Sir*



*We received your mail with thanks also our remittance department ask you
for your information regards the bank transfer into your account, please
you need to send your account information with your home address also phone
number to reach you *



* Please you must read the list of the documentation cover the fund and is
attach below  *




*   1) DEPOSIT CERTIFICATE 2) BANK APPORTION FORM 3) BANK ID CARD AND MY
INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT 4) LITTER YOUNG BOY PASSPORT *

* 5) REFUGEE ID CARD 6) STATEMENT OF ACCOUNT*

*  Please you must read them and make sure you fill out the bank form and
send it back to us to enable our remittance department to transfer the
funds into your account.*




*Thanks we need your urgent response MR. YOBO MICHEAL DIRECTOR OF FIRST
ATLANTIC BANK GHANA CUSTOMER CARE WHATSAPP ONLINE * *+233531933310*
*FROM FIRST ATLANTIC BANK GHANA INTERNATIONAL MONETARY REMITTANCE
DEPARTMENT (ACCRA GHANA )*
This email message is confidential and for use by the addressee only. If
the message is received by anyone other than the addressee, please delete
it from your computer. First Atlantic Bank does not accept responsibility
for changes made to this message after it was sent.Whilst all reasonable
care has been taken to avoid the transmission of viruses, it is the
responsibility of the recipient to ensure that onward transmission, opening
or use of this message and any attachments will not adversely affect its
systems or data. No responsibility is accepted by First Atlantic Bank in
this regard and the recipient should carry out such virus and other checks
as it considers appropriate

subject: Re: THE DOCUMENATIONAL IS ATTACH BELOW REGARDS THE FUND TRANSFER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the detailed information you've provided. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the bank form that needs to be filled out? What kind of information does it require?

Secondly, could you clarify what the 'cover the fund' list is? I'm not quite sure I understand what this means.

Lastly, could you provide more details about the remittance department and how they will transfer funds into my account?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Earl

subject: Re: WE NEED YOUR URGENT RESPOND
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message, could you please clarify? 

You mentioned something about receiving dollars without the owner and needing an honest person to help invest the funds. Could you explain more about this situation? 

Also, you mentioned a boy under your care. Who is this boy and how is he related to the funds?

Lastly, you asked for my bank apportion. I'm not sure what that means. Could you provide more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Earl
